snippet: While President Hugo Chávez lay ill in Havana, a weekend gathering there of Venezuela’s most powerful officials was simply too much for critics who have long warned of Cuba’s influence.
abstract: Venezuela's most powerful officials meet in Havana, Cuba, while Pres Hugo Chavez remains ill in Cuban hospital following cancer surgery; meeting underscores close relationship between two countries and draws criticism from those who have long warned of Cuba's influence over Venezuela.
lead_paragraph: While President Hugo Chávez lay ill in Havana, a weekend gathering there of Venezuela’s most powerful officials was simply too much for critics who have long warned of Cuba’s influence.

headline.main: Meeting in Cuba Angers Venezuelan Opposition
headline.print_headline: Meeting in Cuba Angers Venezuelan Opposition
